channel.title: [DELTA SOURCE] Idk how delete Quests
channel.description: Please help me i look all google information how delete qusts but i dont find answer , please tell me answer. I looking (TextHandler.java , Player.Java , Client.java) i think there are quests interfaces so how i can delete :confused: :confused:?

item.title: [DELTA SOURCE] Idk how delete Quests
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

K Ill explain u very easy,

go to textHandler.java
and search for

client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[ID];

it’s at the top…

Then under that add this;

/* Quest Tab */

c.sendQuest("", 6399);
c.sendQuest("Quest Tab", 640);
c.sendQuest("0", 663);
c.sendQuest("1", 7332);
c.sendQuest("2", 7333);
c.sendQuest("3", 7334);
c.sendQuest("4", 7336);
c.sendQuest("5", 7383);
c.sendQuest("6", 7339);
c.sendQuest("7", 7338);
c.sendQuest("8", 7340);
c.sendQuest("9", 7346);
c.sendQuest("10", 7341);
c.sendQuest("11", 7342);
c.sendQuest("12", 7337);
c.sendQuest("13", 7343);
c.sendQuest("14", 7335);
c.sendQuest("15", 7344);
c.sendQuest("16", 7345);
c.sendQuest("17", 7347);
c.sendQuest("18", 7348);

QuestTab is the text above your tab,
the numbers are the lines u can add text in,

if u want to remove the existing text in the tab,
just search for the lines above (without the numbers in of course)

Read full topic
